FONTS

Total of (1) font being used on entire site:

Variations of how this font is being used:

Headline
.headline {
font-size: 18px;
margin: 0 auto 30px;
text-align: center;
}
Headline LG
.headline_lg {
font-size: 24px;
letter-spacing: 0.1px;
text-align: center;
text-transform: initial;
}
Page title
.page_title {
border-bottom: 1px solid;
font-size: 32px;
margin-bottom: 100px;
margin-top: 40px;
padding-bottom: 10px;
width: 50px;
}
Page title Alt
.page_title_alt {
font-size: 32px;
margin-bottom: 50px;
}
Default Text Micro
.default_text_micro {
font-size: 12px;
}
Default Text sm
.default_text_sm {
font-size: 13px;
font-weight: lighter;
text-transform: initial;
margin-bottom: 5px;
}
Default Text med
.default_text_med {

font-weight: normal;
margin-bottom: 10px;
}
Default Text Lg
.default_text_lg {

}

  • work
  • about
  • contact us

Noisy Tenants are agents for community. We actively seek projects that all point back to community. We aim to connect businesses, schools, neighborhoods and all that good stuff in creative projects that have the capacity to give back and be built upon way after the initial project ends. We look to be a neighborhood institition.
